item.title: 講話してきました
追加で設定した諸々のこと
item.description: 1 2 3 4 5 mkdir ~/src cd ~/src git clone git://github.com/joelthelion/autojump.git cd autojump sudo ./install.sh 1 [[ -s /etc/profile.d/autojump.zsh ]] &amp;&amp; . /etc/profile.d/autojump.zsh 1 autoload -U compinit &amp;&amp; compinit

item.title: 今更rbenvでrubyを管理してみる
item.description: git clone https://github.com/sstephenson/rbenv.git ~/.rbenv echo 'export PATH="$HOME/.rbenv/bin:$PATH"' >> ~/.bash_profile echo 'eval "$(rbenv init -)"' >> ~/.bash_profile exec $SHELL -l git clone https://github.com/sstephenson/ruby-build.git ~/.rbenv/plugins/ruby-build rbenv install --list rbenv install 2.0.0-p247 rbenv
